body.para: Gitweb: http://git.kernel.org/linus/1093736b3c34319b8f1825a4423414d9cf397d73 Commit: 1093736b3c34319b8f1825a4423414d9cf397d73 Parent: 90482e45e4a39ee10b66436c2b3d5d4d88c2f73c Author: Vasiliy Kulikov <segooon@gmail.com> AuthorDate: Thu Nov 11 14:05:11 2010 -0800 Committer: Linus Torvalds <torvalds@linux-foundation.org> CommitDate: Fri Nov 12 07:55:31 2010 -0800
i2c_smbus_read_byte_data() may return negative error code. This is not seen to als_sensing_range_store() as the result is stored in unsigned int.

Signed-off-by: Vasiliy Kulikov <segooon@gmail.com> Cc: Hong Liu <hong.liu@intel.com> Cc: Alan Cox <alan@linux.intel.com> Cc: Anantha Narayanan <anantha.narayanan@intel.com> Signed-off-by: Andrew Morton <akpm@linux-foundation.org> Signed-off-by: Linus Torvalds <torvalds@linux-foundation.org>
body.footer: -- To unsubscribe from this list: send the line "unsubscribe git-commits-head" in the body of a message to majordomo@vger.kernel.org More majordomo info at http://vger.kernel.org/majordomo-info.html
